product_name: The North Face  Warm Crew Neck Long Underwear Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When it's cold and you're ready for snowboarding, skiing, or snowshoeing, let the midweight performance fabric of The North Face Warm Crew Neck long underwear top for men keep you comfortable.
